Verses: 1 naan en janaththin siRaiyiruppaith thiruppumpOdhum, naan iSravElai guNamaakka virumbumpOdhum, eppiraayeemin akkiramamum samaariyaavin pollaappugaLum veLippaduththappadum; avargaL vanjanai seygiRaargaL; thirudan uLLE varugiRaan; veLiyE paRigaararin koottaththaar koLLaiyidugiRaargaL.

2 avargaL pollaappaiyellaam naan ninaivil vaiththirukkiREn endru avargaL thangaL irudhayaththil sindhikkiRadhillai; ippOdhum avargaLudaiya kiriyaigaL avargaLai soozhndhukoNdadhu; avaigaL en mugaththukku mun irukkiRadhuï¿½.
3 raajaavaith thangaL pollaappinaalum, adhipadhigaLaith thangaL poigaLinaalum sandhOshappaduththugiRaargaL.
4 avargaL ellaarum vibasaarakkaLLar; appanchudugiRavan erikkum aduppaippOl irukkiRaargaL; avan maavaip pisaindhadhu mudhal, adhu uppippOgumattum, analai moottaamal OindhirukkiRaan.
5 nammudaiya raajaavin naaLendru solli, adhipadhigaL dhraatcharasath thuruththigaLaal avanukku vyaadhiyuNdaakkugiRaargaL; sarasakkaararOdEkooda avan than kaiyai neettugiRaan.

6 avargaL padhivirukkumpOdhu, thangaL irudhayaththai aduppaippOl aayaththappaduththugiRaargaL; avargaLil alappumoottugiRavan raamuzhudhum thoonginaalum, kaalamEyOvendraal adhu juvaalikkiRa akkiniyaai eriyum.
7 avargaL ellaarum aduppaippOl analaagi, thangaL nyaayaadhipadhigaLaip patchiththaargaL; avargaLudaiya raajaakkaL ellaarum vizhundhaargaL; avargaLil ennai nOkkik kooppidugiRavan oruvanum illai.
8 eppiraayeem anniyajanangaLOdE kalandhirukkiRaan; eppiraayeem thiruppipOdaadha appam.
9 anniyar avanudaiya balaththaith thingiRaargaL; avanO adhai aRiyaan; naraimayirum avanil theLiththirukkiRadhu, avanO adhai aRiyaadhirukkiRaan.
10 iSravElin agandhai avargaL mugaththukku munbaaga saatchiyittaalum, avargaL thangaL dhEvanaagiya karththaridaththil thirumbaamalum, ivai ellaavatrilum avaraith thEdaamalum irukkiRaargaL.
11 eppiraayeem pEdhaiyaana puRaavaippOl irukkiRaan, avanukku buththiyillai; egipthiyanaik kooppidugiRaargaL; aseeriyanidaththukkum pOgiRaargaL.
12 avargaL pOgumpOdhu, en valaiyai avargaLmEl veesuvEn, avargaLai aagaayaththup paRavaigaLaippOla keezhE vizhappaNNuvEn; avargaLudaiya sabaiyil kELviyaanadhinpadiyE avargaLai dhaNdippEn.

13 avargaL ennaivittu alaindhuthirigiRapadiyinaal avargaLukku aiyO! avargaLukkuk kEduvarum; enakku virOdhamaaga iraNdagampaNNinaargaL; naan avargaLai meettirundhum, avargaL enakku virOdhamaagap pEsugiRaargaL.

14 avargaL thangaL padukkaigaLil alaRugiRapOdhu, thangaL irudhayaththil ennai nOkkik kooppidugiRadhillai; avargaL dhaaniyaththukkaagavum dhraatcharasaththukkaagavum koodugiRaargaL; ennai veRuththu vilagippOgiRaargaL.
15 naan avargaLai dhaNdiththEn; avargaLudaiya buyangaL thirumba balappadavumpaNNinEn; aagilum enakku virOdhamaagap pollaappu ninaikkiRaargaL.

16 thirumbugiRaargaL, aanaalum unnadhamaanavaridaththiRku alla; mOsampOkkugiRa villaippOlirukkiRaargaL; avargaLudaiya adhipadhigaL thangaL naavinudaiya ukkiraththinimiththam pattayaththaal vizhuvaargaL; idhuvE egipthudhEsaththinimiththam avargaLukku varum nindhai.
